alert.note: Alert for Northern Lake County; Southern Lake County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 7:36PM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lake County through 815 PM PDT... At 735 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Konocti Bay, or 13 miles east of Lakeport, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lakeport, Upper Lake, Clearlake, Seigler Springs, Forest Lake, Adams, Loch Lomond, Mount Konocti, Hobergs, Ettawa Springs, Glenhaven, Soda Bay, North Lakeport, Konocti Bay, Whispering Pines, Finley, Kelseyville, Buckingham Park, Lower Lake and Cobb. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lake County; Southern Lake County
